description: Sample Gemini response structure for stance generation. Used for snapshot/golden-file testing.

stances.position: Supports tree protection with reasonable thresholds
stances.summary: Mayor Screech consistently voted in favour of environmental protection measures including the Tree Protection Bylaw, while supporting amendments to balance homeowner concerns.

evidence.agenda_item_title: Tree Protection Bylaw No. 1160 - Second and Third Readings
evidence.statement_text: Voted in favour of second and third readings of Tree Protection Bylaw with amended threshold
evidence.context: Bylaw debate on tree diameter threshold

overall_position: Generally supportive of environmental regulation with pragmatic compromises
